xmlText.p: First Period_1, Buffalo, Reinhart 10 (Wilson, Antipin), 4:27. Penalties_Vanek, VAN, (slashing), 6:30; Biega, VAN, (delay of game), 13:28; Girgensons, BUF, (hooking), 13:28.
